name: comet-browser
title: Comet Browser
description: Enable one to search history and current open tabs
author: ArthurLin0906

commands.name: search-tabs
commands.title: Search Tabs
commands.description: Search currently open tabs in Comet browser

commands.name: search-comet
commands.title: Search Comet
commands.description: Unified search across tabs and history

commands.name: new-tab
commands.title: New Tab
commands.description: Open a new tab in Comet browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
